eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayada eyata anukulawa mahajanaya idiriye hasiremin chandaya illa siti bawa mahajanayata amathaka wi nathi bawa rata karawannan mathaka thaba gatha yuthuya. 13 wana wyawastha sanshodhanaya namathi niyamitha kalaya pamini wita pipirawima sandaha indiyawa wisin balahathkarayen apa wyawasthawa thula atawa thabu kala bombaya pipirimata kalaya lanwa atha.

berawala hettimulle sancharaka hotal atharamada niwasak sahitha par 50k.berawala hettimulla sancharaka hotal atharamada itha niskalanka watapitawak sahitha jala/widuli/durakathana athulu siyaluma pahasukam thibe.siyalu liyakiyawili nirawul.idama wate sancharaka hotal.sancharaka hotalayak idikirimaya itha yogya we.itha ikmanin wadima illumata..watinakamin ihala idamaki.laksha 85.mila sakachcha kala haka.wate thappa idikara atha.
